bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions lasting long without being cured. Wai ke jing yao 外科精要 Fj: 若頑瘡痼疾，脾胃虛弱，營氣不能滋養患處，以致寒邪內襲而不 愈，宜用小艾炷頻灸瘡口 , “In the case of an obstinacy-illness ailment of stubborn sores , when the spleen and stomach are depleted and weak, and when the camp qi is no longer able to provide nourishment to the ailing location, with the result that cold evil attacks the interior and this cannot be cured, it is advisable to use a small mugwort-lamp wick to repeatedly cauterize the opening of the sores”.
